name: Blastoise
Attack1Text: After your attack, you may switch Blastoise with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
Attack2Text: Blastoise does 10 damage to itself. Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Blastoise by attacks during your opponent's next turn.

name: Flareon
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 basic Energy cards attached to Flareon or this attack does nothing.

name: Jolteon
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Minun
Attack1Text: Draw a card. If you have Plusle in play, draw 2 cards instead.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 10 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Plusle
Attack1Text: Draw a card. If you have Minun in play, draw 2 cards instead.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Vaporeon
Attack2Text: Does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Vaporeon but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 40 damage in this way.

name: Combusken
Attack2Text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to Combusken.

name: Donphan
Attack1Text: Put any 1 card from your discard pile into your hand.
Attack2Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Forretress
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on the Defending Pokémon between turns.

name: Ditto
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for another Ditto and switch it with Ditto. (Any cards attached to Ditto, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) If you do, put Ditto on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Duplicate Poké-Power each turn.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Eevee
evolvesTo: Vaporeon, Jolteon, Flareon, Sylveon, Espeon, Umbreon, Leafeon, Glaceon

name: Ivysaur
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Pichu Bros.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads. If either coin is heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Ho-Oh ex
Ability1Text: If Ho-Oh ex would be Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, you may move up to 2 Energy attached to Ho-Oh ex to your Pokémon in any way you like.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 20 more damage for each type of basic Energy card attached to Ho-Oh ex.
